makers.displaymaker: formerly attributed to Alonso Berruguete, Spanish, ca. 1488 - 1561

texts.textentryhtml: Mathias Polakovits, Paris and New York, stamp lower right [Lugt 3561]

This drawing had been attributed to the circle of Alonso Berruguete (1486-1561) when it was first acquired by the museum, but the attribution cannot be certain as the work does not relate directly to any of Berruguete's known commissions.

Adapted from: Lisa A. Banner, Spanish Drawings in the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2012).
texts.remarks: 2019-5-2; Adapted from: Lisa A. Banner, Spanish Drawings in the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2012).
